sub_title: Multiple positions in Shell and its JVs at manufacturing sites and central office.
summary:
Specialties:
- Ethylene and other base chemicals production through steam cracking
- Fired heat transfer and combustion
- Process Safety
- Utilities (from boiler feed water to steam turbines)
- Energy and CO2, benchmarking and improvement identification
